name: Wax Your Hair
tag_list: wax, your, hair, wax-your-hair, waxing-kits, kits, waxing-products, accessories, waxing, body, strips, applicators, bliss, depileve, epillyss, fantasea, gigi, huini, jilbere, parissa, sally-hanson, satin-smooth, surgi
overview: Wax Your Hair is America’s favorite website for body and hair waxing kits, products and accessories. We have the lowest prices and largest selection of body and hair waxing products in the world. Our products include hair waxing kits, body wax, waxing strips, wax applicators and more. Our brands include Bliss, Depileve, Epillyss, FantaSea, GiGi, Huini, Jilbere, Parissa, Sally Hanson, Satin Smooth, Surgi and more. Please visit our website at www.waxyourhair.com for more information.
